issue.title: Why can't we concatenate two tables across both axis?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16479](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16479). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, pa.concat only concatenates table along axis=0. We already have append function, can we not extend it?
